channel.title: TOR:EQX on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in TOR:EQX on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Equinox Gold Options Bet Nets Quick 170% Gain on Earnings Beat
item.description: An investor who bought 6 million shares worth of Equinox Gold Corp. call options Tuesday more than doubled their money after the Vancouver-based miner’s earnings beat estimates, sending shares soaring
